description:
Tokio and Calen arrive in America in 1969 to find out the True History about the Moon landing. However, they arrive in Hollywood and sneak into a studio... There, they find a set that looks like the Moon landing. Apparently they were preparing to deal with filming since President Nixon suddenly said they would go to the Moon on July 20th. Meanwhile, Akudarma tries to figure out what to do since they find out the Moon landing was fake. Bimajo says that they should just go to the Moon themselves, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: America no Getsumenchakuriku wa Yarase Datta!!
アメリカの月面着陸はヤラセだった!
